text: "Just Good Friends" is a 1987 song duet by American recording artist Michael Jackson and musician Stevie Wonder. It is the fifth track from Jackson's seventh studio album Bad and was the only track not released as a single. It is the second track on the album to feature a duet including "I Just Can't Stop Loving You". ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:Funk songs Category:Pop songs Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:Stevie Wonder songs
